content.text: Write the following in order of size, starting with the smallest
The ferry from Helsinki to Travemunde leaves Helsinki at 17 30 on a Tuesday. The journey takes 28 hours 45 minutes
Work out the day and time that the ferry arrives in Travemunde
From the above word, write down the letters which have
Work out how many degrees higher the temperature is in December than in January
The table shows the average monthly temperatures in Beijing
A lake has an area of \(63 800 000 000\) square metres
Write this area in square kilometres, correct to 2 significant figures
The number of people, \(n\) , who attended a concert was 12 600 to the nearest 100
Use the exchange rate £1 = 143 Japanese Yen to find the cost of the flight in Japanese Yen
Write your answer to part (a) in standard form
Keiko travels from Tokyo to London for the Olympic Games
On the internet, a flight costs £767
The perimeter of the rectangle is the same length as the circumference of the circle
Calculate the radius, \(r\) , of the circle
the number of games won and the total points scored,
the number of games drawn and the average height of the team,
the number of goals scored and the final position in the league
Scatter diagrams are drawn to compare sets of data from each team in a hockey league during
Write down the type of correlation you would expect to see when the data recorded is
Write down the mathematical name of the quadrilateral
Find the area of the quadrilateral and give the units
The diagram shows a quadrilateral drawn on a 1 cm square grid
Calculate the angle of the sector for blue shirts
The shirt colour of the teams in a football league are shown in the following table
The pie chart shows some of this information
The sectors for red shirts and white shirts have been drawn
How far has the taxi travelled?
Taxi fares cost \(30\%\) more at night
How much does a \$9 daytime journey cost at night?
The taxi fare in a city is \$3 and then \$0.40 for every kilometre travelled
AC is a diameter of a circle, centre \(O\)
BCD is a tangent to the circle and \(E\) is a point on the circumference
Write down all your working to show that angle \(ABC\) is a right angle
Show that the sum of the interior angles of a regular pentagon is \(540^{\circ}\)
\(BC\) is parallel to \(AE\) and angle \(CDE\) is a right angle
